to.desc: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'to' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

exact.desc: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'exact' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

replace.desc: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'replace' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

active-class.desc: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'active-class' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

exact-active-class.desc: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'active-class' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

href.desc: Native <a> link href attribute; Has priority over the 'to'/'exact'/'replace'/'active-class'/'exact-active-class' props

target.desc: Native <a> link target attribute; Use it only along with 'href' prop; Has priority over the 'to'/'exact'/'replace'/'active-class'/'exact-active-class' props

model-value.desc: Model of the component defining 'open' state; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

expand-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

expanded-icon.desc: Expand icon name (following Quasar convention) for when QExpansionItem is expanded; When used, it also disables the rotation animation of the expand icon; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

expand-icon-class.desc: Apply custom class(es) to the expand icon item section

toggle-aria-label.desc: aria-label to be used on the expansion toggle element

label-lines.desc: Apply ellipsis when there's not enough space to render on the specified number of lines; If more than one line specified, then it will only work on webkit browsers because it uses the '-webkit-line-clamp' CSS property!

caption-lines.desc: Apply ellipsis when there's not enough space to render on the specified number of lines; If more than one line specified, then it will only work on webkit browsers because it uses the '-webkit-line-clamp' CSS property!

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

header-inset-level.desc: Apply an inset to header (unless using 'header' slot); Useful when header avatar/left side is missing but you want to align content with other items that do have a left side, or when you're building a menu

content-inset-level.desc: Apply an inset to content (changes content padding)

expand-separator.desc: Apply a top and bottom separator when expansion item is opened

default-opened.desc: Puts expansion item into open state on initial render; Overridden by v-model if used

hide-expand-icon.desc: Do not show the expand icon

expand-icon-toggle.desc: Applies the expansion events to the expand icon only and not to the whole header

switch-toggle-side.desc: Switch expand icon side (from default 'right' to 'left')

dense-toggle.desc: Use dense mode for expand icon

group.desc: Register expansion item into a group (unique name that must be applied to all expansion items in that group) for coordinated open/close state within the group a.k.a. 'accordion mode'

header-style.desc: Apply custom style to the header

header-class.desc: Apply custom class(es) to the header

default.desc: Slot used for expansion item's content

header.desc: Slot used for overriding default header

detailsId.desc: QExpansionItem details panel id (for use in aria-controls)

toggle.desc: Triggers component to toggle between show/hide

update:model-value.desc: Emitted when showing/hidden state changes; Is also used by v-model

show.desc: Emitted after component has triggered show()

before-show.desc: Emitted when component triggers show() but before it finishes doing it

hide.desc: Emitted after component has triggered hide()

before-hide.desc: Emitted when component triggers hide() but before it finishes doing it

after-show.desc: Emitted when component show animation is finished

after-hide.desc: Emitted when component hide animation is finished

toggle.desc: Triggers component to toggle between show/hide
